casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 19, 2014

[Cite as 05/19/2014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-2101.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2014-0683. Toland v. Ohio State Univ.

Franklin App. No. 14AP-205. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County.

*1500Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for mediation, it is ordered by the court that the motion for mediation is denied.
